article: In order to safeguard the education of all Hope Chinese Scholl ( HCS ) students and the normal running of the school , the following rules should be followed : Be quiet in classroom and hallways . Do not run or shout in classrooms or hallways . Do not drink or eat in classrooms or hallways . Stay in the school during school time as well as rest time . Do not leave the school or play out of the school area during school time . This includes rest time . Do not _ on any desks or walls . Be respectful to teachers and parents . Help teachers and other students to keep the classroom clean . Do not move desks , chairs , and other furniture in the classroom without the teacher ' s instructions .
